entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 19 except 12 near Lake Huron. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. High 19 except 12 near Lake Huron. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
